title: 40 Years of Research on LGBT Families
description: To celebrate LGBT History Month, we are delighted to welcome Professor Susan Golombok, director of the Centre for Family Research at the University of Cambridge and author of the award-winning book Modern Families, to The Cass Centre on Thursday, 15 February. The Cass Centre bar will open specially for the evening, with time to socialise after the talk. All are warmly invited to hear Professor Golombok speak about 40 years of research on LGBT+ families. Free registration on the Eventbrite event at https://40yearsresearch.eventbrite.co.uk/ required.
